message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "When the actual servlet is invoked, the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener is incorrectly set to something other than ASYNC. If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType in the listener should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.", "OB": "The DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener is incorrectly set on async dispatch.", "EB": "The DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener should be set to ASYNC on async dispatch.", "SR": "Ensure that the DispatcherType in the ServletRequestListener is correctly set to ASYNC on async dispatch."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
